ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think she meant that she wanted to know the OTHER benefits beyond not having to sit while medding. :-) 5k for a horse is still outrageous.... Unless that
ygData.messageBody:
> Ummm ok. Hint inc.....
>
> Have you ever noticed that you draw a lot more aggro sitting than standing
> or are you always soloing instead of grouping?
>
I think she meant that she wanted to know the OTHER benefits beyond not
having to sit while medding. :-)
5k for a horse is still outrageous.... Unless that horse can carry stuff for
me and keep me from being encumbered.. Oh, and for the 10+ horses, they
better perform sexual favors for merchants to get me better prices and
faction for me to pay that kind of cash.
luv,
-Su
